Message.Title: Proxy vote
Message.Msg: How do you vote your proxy to Southeast?

Message.Title: I got a phone call this weekend from the Wall Street firm representing Michael Dell and the Board
Message.Msg: in the proxy voting. They wanted to know if I received a ballot...and then wanted to know how I was planning to vote. Clearly they must be worried about the outcome of the upcoming vote, to be polling/lobbying a medium sized holder like myself (approximately 17,000 share). If my vote is indicative of the outcome, they should be worried...

Topic.Title: I got a phone call this weekend from the Wall Street firm representing Michael Dell and the Board

Message.Msg: I only have 5000 shares and I will definitely vote against MD unless he increases his bid to at least $15. MD knows best about the value of the company and it's definitely higher than $13.65. Vote no to MD.
